page.title: 06A Schoolboys Typical Day.
page.content: I'm woken by my clock-radio at 6.15am and I get up to have a shower. I have my breakfast which dad has already prepared and usually consists of 2 bowls of cornflakes ad an orange. I then leave for the papershop to do my paper round. It usually only takes me 30 minutes. I get home at 7.45am and watch T.V. or read a book until its time to go to school. I walk there with friends. During the spring and summer term I play tennis before lessons begin. During games lessons I enjoy playing football,rugby,gymnastics,tennis, athletics,softball,cricket and cross-country. Several days a week my mum and dad are caught behind for a meeting at school and I have to look after my younger brother and sister.
